ProductInfo.Features:
Newest Allwinner A20 Dual Core CPU (1.2GHz) with Quad core Mali-400 MP GPU, offer unprecedented fast surfing online, video playing and 3D games playing experience
Latest Google Android 4.2 Jelly Bean OS, enjoy the most new and abundant android apps.
With front & back dual cameras (0.3MP & 2MP), be adequate for skype video chat and taking general pictures.
8GB storage capacity, built-in micro sd card, can be expanded to 32GB
Built-in 3.7V 6000mAh Li-Polymer rechargeable battery, enjoy longer running time (almost 3 hours for stand-by status)
ProductInfo.Name: iRulu 10.1 inch Android Tablet PC, 4.2 Jelly Bean OS, Dual Core, Allwinner A20 CPU, Dual Cameras, 5 Point Capacitive Touch Screen, 8GB Storage, White Color
